strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to show an options dialog
strings.GADGET_COPYRIGHT: Copyright (c) 2007 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved
strings.GADGET_ABOUT: Options Dialog Sample Gadget Copyright (c) 2007 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved This gadget shows how to use the options dialog functionality. An options dialog has a seperate options.xml file which designs and controls it. Using the options object, you can save settings throughout multiple sessions of your gadget. This sample demonstrates three checkboxes in an options dialog.
